products.name: Super Delights Brownie Bites
products.description: Delicious bite-sized chocolate brownies. Moist, fudgey, and chocolatey. Tastes like KFC brownies.

products.name: Snackers Nachos
products.description: Crispy and crunchy nachos. Available in Cheese, BBQ, or Sweet & Spicy.

products.name: RSL Fish Crackers
products.description: Crispy and crunchy fish crackers. Available in Plain or Spicy. Comes in 1kg, 500g, 200g, or 100g.
